title: Quick Take: Clinton's Health/'Basket of Deplorables'
description: Hillary Clinton was in the news for a couple of reasons over the weekend. This episode: host/campaign reporter Sam Sanders, White House correspondent Tamara Keith, and political editor Domenico Montanaro. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
